casebody.data:
PEOPLE of the State of Michigan, Plaintiff-Appellee,
v.
Eric Miguel DOWDY, Defendant-Appellant. SC: 158098
COA: 343551 Supreme Court of Michigan. March 4, 2019

Order

On order of the Chief Justice, the motion of plaintiff-appellee to extend the time for filing its answer, as directed by this Court in its February 4, 2019 order, is GRANTED. The answer will be accepted as timely filed if submitted on or before May 3, 2019.
